Content.Text:
<FACE_ALLEN><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hey, <MYNAME>. Are you here to see me or
what? That's very good of you.
<PAGE>
Perfect timing actually... I've got
something to chat with you about.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOSS>
So... This isn't really the best place.
Here, come with me.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
You come and talk with me a lot, huh?
Something about me interest you?
<PAGE>
You know, lately a lot of people have
asked me if we're dating. It's a pain
denying it all the time.
<PAGE>
So, I was thinking it might be best if
we really go out with each other.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Whatcha say, <MYNAME>? Want to be my girl?
I promise not to hurt you.
Go out with him
Don't go out with him

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
That's what I wanted to hear. I mean,
not that I thought you'd ever turn down
a guy like me.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE><ACTION_RIBBON>From now on... you're my girl.
Thanks, princess.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Wanna take this opportunity to change
up what we call each other? Something
more lovey-dovey? Have any requests?
Keep the same name
Change it

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
So <BLUE><MYNAME></BLUE> is what you want me
to call you?
Yes
No

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
All right. Got it.
<PAGE>
Hey, <MYNAME>. Now that you're going out
with me, don't you go and get eyes
for any other fellas.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Oops, already pretty late, huh? I've
got to head home. <MYNAME>, come see
me again soon.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Oh boy... You've got no taste in men.
None. I'm disappointed.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
That's the end of this chat. I don't
want any misunderstandings either. Try
to keep your distance from now on, OK?

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
<MYNAME>! You came here to meet me? That's
great!
<PAGE>
<FACE_SAD>Do you, um...have some time? I've
got something to talk to you about.

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
No, it's not really that big of a thing,
but it's kind of hard to discuss here.
Follow me.

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
I... Er... T-The breeze is pretty nice
today, huh? I always liked the
mountaintop.
<PAGE>
No... that's not what I want to talk
about. What am I doing? I'm such
a dummy.
<PAGE>
<MYNAME>, please listen. I really
like you!

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
I want to be with you. If you feel the
same way... will you be my girlfriend?
Become his girlfriend
Turn him down

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
R-Really? Excellent!
<PAGE>
<ACTION_RIBBON>Thanks, <MYNAME>! That makes me so
happy! I promise that I'll treat you
right.

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<FACE_LOVE>Hey, given this special occasion,
let's change what we call each
other.
<PAGE>
That will make the whole boyfriend
and girlfriend thing seem more real.
So, what do you want me to call you?
Keep the same name
Change it

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
You'd like to be called <BLUE><MYNAME></BLUE>, right?
Yes
No

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<MYNAME> it is. Got it.

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Well, I've got something I need to take
care of, so I've got to get going. Sorry
I can't see you home.
<PAGE>
Until next time, <MYNAME>. I look forward
to our time together.

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Ah!
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOSS>
I see. Being asked that all of sudden
really put you on the spot.
<PAGE>
Just pretend that I didn't say
anything... I'm sorry, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
W-Well, time to get going. See you
later, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Hi there, <MYNAME>. Thanks for coming.
I've been waiting for you.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
<MYNAME>, I've actually got something
to talk with you about. Mind if we have
a change of scenery? Follow me.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
So, <MYNAME>. Even though I come off the
way I do, I'm actually an experienced
adult, you know.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>That's to say, whenever you're in a
pinch, I want you to be able to rely
on me. I'd like to support you.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>The gist of what I'm getting at
here is how do you feel about
going out with me?

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Don't think about it too deeply. I
mean, just consider giving me a shot.
What do ya say?
Go out with him
Turn him down

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Ah ha. You agree to go for it. I'm glad.
Thanks, <MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
<ACTION_RIBBON>Well, that means that starting today
I'm your boyfriend.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Since we're a proper couple now, maybe
it would make things more exciting if
we change what we call each other.
<PAGE>
What would you like me to call
you? Give it some thought.
Keep the same name
Change it

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
So, <BLUE><MYNAME></BLUE> is what you
want me to call you, right?
Yes
No

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<MYNAME> it is then. Hmm... That's a
pretty good name. Oh? You don't want
me to add "honey" at the end anymore?
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOSS>But... I've been adding "honey"
now and again for a while. I feel like
it fits you now.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>And after all, it does sound pretty
cute! I'll keep using it sometimes,
okay?

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
This is the start of a fresh stage for
us. Let's give it our best.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>Oops, I forgot about some minor business
I have to take care of. I'll be on my
way then. See you soon, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Ugh, I see. Actually, I thought you
might say that.
<PAGE>
Sorry, <MYNAME>. How about we forget
about the whole thing?

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Well, I'll be on my way then. Catch
you later.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Welcome, <MYNAME>. Thank you very much
for coming. I have been awaiting your
arrival.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Today, I have something I'd like to 
talk to discuss with you. I wonder if
you have some time now?

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_PATI>
...
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>Ah, please excuse me. It's my first time
doing something like this, so I find
myself to be a little nervous.
<PAGE>
By any chance, would you be interested
in going out with me, <MYNAME>?

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_PATI>
I do not mean to put you on the spot.
Please don't feel any pressure to say
yes.
<PAGE>
If you'd rather not, then I prefer that
you simply tell me straight out.
Go out with him
Turn him down

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
<ACTION_RIBBON>Thank you very much. Let us further
strengthen our relationship...as
sweethearts.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
My dating experience is limited, so I
might cause some mishaps. I'd like to
apologize in advance.
<PAGE>
Also, now that we are in a relationship,
I think adding "Miss" before your
name is a little too formal.
<PAGE>
I'll just use your name alone from now
on. In regards to that, would you like
me to change what I call you?
Keep the same name
Change it

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Will <BLUE><MYNAME></BLUE> do?
Yes
No

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
<MYNAME>...
<PAGE>
It still doesn't quite roll off my
tongue. It may take a little time for
me to get really used to saying it.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Ah, it's gotten late.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>I'm sorry, <MYNAME>.
I must excuse myself as I have some
business to attend to.
<PAGE>
Well then, see you soon. Please have
a safe trip home.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
So that's how you feel... I understand.
I'm very sorry for wasting your time
like that.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>Please don't worry too much about what
just went on. Let's try to keep the same
friendly relationship we've always had.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Well then, I will be leaving. Please
come to the mansion to see me
again sometime.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hi there, <MYNAME>. Perfect timing.
There's something I've been meaning
to ask you.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
Hmm... It's a little difficult to tell
you here. Let's head for the
mountaintop.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
...
<PAGE>
Ah, I've been staring at you. My bad.
<PAGE>
Um... Well, <MYNAME>, so is there anyone
you're interested or want to, you
know, go out with?

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
I-If not, then maybe I could be that
guy?
Say you want him as your boyfriend
Turn him down

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
<ACTION_RIBBON>I-I see. I suppose that means
we'll try dating each other.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
But... I don't really have any idea
how to proceed from here.
<PAGE>
Ah, yes. Don't people normally
change what they call each other
at times like this?
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOSS>Can't really think of anything myself
right now. How about you? Do you
want me to call you something else?
Keep the same name
Change it

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Is <BLUE><MYNAME></BLUE> okay with you?
Yes
No

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
All right, I've got it. Call me what
you wish. But no funny names! Okay?

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
Well, it seems that's decided. I'll be
heading home now. See ya, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
...
<PAGE>
<FACE_ANGRY>I see. Understood. Sorry for saying
something strange like that. Don't worry
I won't asking anything like that again.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
I'm going home. See ya.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Ah, <MYNAME>. You came to see me. Your
timing is just perfect.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOSS>
Actually there is something I want to 
ask you, but it's hard to talk about
here. Let's head to the mountaintop.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_PATI>
...
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>Please excuse me. I have been trying
to work up some courage, but I think I'm
ready now.
<PAGE>
<MYNAME>... I'll come right out and ask.
What do you think of me?

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_PATI>
I really like you. In fact, I would like
it if you went out with me.
Go out with him
Turn him down

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
<ACTION_RIBBON>All right! Thanks, <MYNAME>. I'm very
happy.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I suppose this makes us a proper
couple. I hope for the best going
forward.
<PAGE>
To show that we really are sweethearts,
I think it would be nice to change what
we call each other. Any preferences?
My name is fine as it is
Change what he calls you

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
So is <BLUE><MYNAME></BLUE> what you
want me to call you?
Yes
No

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
You know, <MYNAME>, from now on you
can always rely on me. Let me know
anytime you find yourself in a bind.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh my, look at the time. I'm sorry,
<MYNAME>. I must leave you now as I
have something to take care of.
<PAGE>
I'm most sorry I can't see you home.
Please have a safe journey back.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
I see... Sorry for asking you something
like that so suddenly. Please don't
worry about it.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Well then, I'll be going now.

<FACE_TINA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
<MYNAME>, I'm happy to see you! I
was just going to head to your house
myself.

<FACE_TINA><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOSS>
Actually there's something I want
to talk about. Will you listen to
what I've got to say?

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
Sorry to drag you all the way out here.
But talking about this would have been
hard at my house...
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>I don't want to come across as wishy-
washy, so I'm going to come right out
and say it. <MYNAME>, I really like you.

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
If you feel the same way, go out
with me. Please!
Go out with her
Turn her down

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
<ACTION_RIBBON>
I'm so happy! Thanks!<RED>∀</RED>

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
Well, first things first. Wanna come up
with new names to call each other? I
mean, it's what sweethearts would do.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>What would you like me to call
you from now on?
Keep the same name
Change it

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Is <BLUE><MYNAME></BLUE> good?
Yes
No

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
I've got it, <MYNAME>. Let's get to
know each other better... as boyfriend
and girlfriend of course.

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh my, it's already that late?! I wish
I could stay a little longer!
<PAGE>
Sorry, <MYNAME>. I've got something urgent
to take care of. Come see me again soon.
Take care!

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
I see... That's too bad, but if that's
how you feel, then nothing can
be done.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>I'm glad I got that off my chest even
if I was turned downed. Thanks. I
hope we can still be friends as usual.

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Well, I'll be going now. See you.

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Oh, <MYNAME>! You came to see
me? That makes me really happy.<RED>∀</RED>
<PAGE>
Oh, that's right. I have something
pretty important to ask of you. Is it
all right if we talk for a bit?

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
...It's kind of hard to tell you here.
Wanna go outside for a bit? Come
with me.

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Will you hear me out, <MYNAME>?
I'm actually interested in this guy...
<PAGE>
When I think about him, my heart
races, and I can't sleep. He makes
my heart go all pitter-patter!
<PAGE>
That guy I'm talking about...well,
he's you, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
I'm asking you, <MYNAME>. Will you
be my boyfriend? I hope I'm good
enough for you...
Of course.
I'm sorry.

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Ah, that's great.<RED>∀</RED> I have no
idea what I'd do if you turned me
down.
<PAGE>
<ACTION_RIBBON>Thanks, <MYNAME>. From today on we are
officially sweethearts.<RED>∀</RED>

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
I'm so happy to get a ring!
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>Oh, that's right. What should I call
you from now on? Want to change it to
something more fitting of sweethearts?
Keep the same name
Change it

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
So you want me to call you <BLUE><MYNAME></BLUE>?
Yes
No

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
<MYNAME> it is.<RED>∀</RED> Here's to us!

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oops... Looks like I'm out of time.
I have something I need to take care of.
Too bad.
<PAGE>
Sorry for taking off first. You'll come
see me again soon, right? You know
I'll be waiting eagerly. <RED>∀</RED>

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
I see... Sorry for asking the impossible
of you. I sure won't be asking again.

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Everything between us is fine, so don't
sweat it. Bye now.

<FACE_YURI><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
<MYNAME>... welcome. I was... waiting.

<FACE_YURI><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
I've got something to tell you...
Follow me.

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
...
<PAGE>
When I'm with you... I'm really
happy.
<PAGE>
So... I want to be together more.

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I want you to go out with me.
Of course.
I'm sorry.

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_PATI>
...
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE><ACTION_RIBBON>I'm happy... Thank you.

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, yes. We should change what we
call each other. That's what's done,
right? I read about it in a book...
<PAGE>
What should I call you? Let me
know... please.
Keep the same name
Change it

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Is <BLUE><MYNAME></BLUE> okay?
Yes
No

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Okay... I've got it. <MYNAME>, please
continue to treat me well.

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Ah... I've got to tell mother. She'll
be so happy.
<PAGE>
Well then... <MYNAME>. See you soon.

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
I understand... Please forget it.

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
I'm going home now... See you.

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
<MYNAME>, I'm happy that you came to see
me.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>Um... <MYNAME>. Sorry to be so
sudden, but do you have a moment?

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
There's something I would like to
tell you.
<PAGE>
This is not the place to say it, so
would you mind going somewhere else?
All right, let's go.

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
<MYNAME>, the thing I want to tell you
has to do with my feelings toward you.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>I'll just be honest. I have
a yearning for you.

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
As a blacksmith I'm still only an
apprentice, but I'll try my best to
become someone worthy of you.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>If you happen to feel even the slightest
flicker of affection toward me, how
about going out with me?
Go out with her
Turn her down

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
<ACTION_RIBBON>T-Thank you very much! I have
little experience dating, but let's
give it our best.

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
Um... Now that we're in a relationship,
want to change what we call each
other?
<PAGE>
Actually... I've been looking forward to
doing something like that ever since I
was a little girl. If it's all right...
Keep the same name
Change it

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Shall I call you <BLUE><MYNAME></BLUE> from now on?
Yes
No

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I understand. Well then, <MYNAME>, let's
give this relationship our best.

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh no, it's already quite late. Please
excuse me, I have some business I need
to attend to.
<PAGE>
<MYNAME>, take care of yourself. Well
then, see you soon.

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
I-I see... Understood.

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Well then, I will be heading home now.
Goodbye, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
<MYNAME>, welcome! Thank you for
stopping by to see me.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOSS>Ah, that's right. I have something
important to talk with you about.

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Being important and all... Do you
mind if we step outside to talk?
Here, follow me.

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
The air feels really nice, huh? The
water's also beautiful and gives me
a sense of calm.
<PAGE>
It's the same kind of feeling I get when
I'm with you, <MYNAME>... pleasant
and soothing.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>That's why I'd like to spend a lot
more time together with you.
<PAGE>
That's to say, I really like you,
<MYNAME>. As things stand now, I don't
see you nearly enough.

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
<MYNAME>, please go out with me.
<PAGE>
Let's create fun memories together as
we sample all sorts of delicious foods.
Go out with her
Turn her down

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
Now it's official that we're
s-w-e-e-t-h-e-a-r-t-s. I'm so happy! <RED>∀</RED>

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Given the special occasion, how about
we change up what we call each other
as a symbol of our love? <RED>∀</RED>
<PAGE>
I suppose we could also just call each
other by our regular names. What do
you think?
My name is fine as it is
Change what she calls you

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
So is <BLUE><MYNAME></BLUE> okay with you?
Yes
No

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
<MYNAME> it is then. I hope to hear
you calling my name more often
now, as well.
<PAGE>
After all, just hearing you say my name
is enough to make me happy. <RED>∀</RED>

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Well then, I must be going as I
have something to take care of.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH><MYNAME>, now that you're my boyfriend,
please come over to see me often!

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
I see... That's too bad, but I guess
that's just how it goes. Sorry for my
selfish request.

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
I guess I will be going home now.
Don't worry too much about our
talk today.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>Come to the restaurant to get
a bite to eat anytime. Bye now.

<FACE_WITCH><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, <MYNAME>. You did well to get here.
I've been waiting.

<FACE_WITCH><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
It's not a big deal or anything, but
I've got a little something to tell
you.
<PAGE>
I'll give you the details back at your
place. Come on, let's get going.

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<MYNAME>, you better give an honest
answer to what I'm about to ask. I'll
spot any lie easily anyway.
<PAGE>
<MYNAME>... do you like me?

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
I knew it! I was pretty sure you
felt that way.
<PAGE>
Well, it can't be helped then. I was
just starting to get bored anyway.
So, you'll go out with me, right?
Go out with her
Turn her down

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
<ACTION_RIBBON>Hehe. You're a good boy, just
like I thought. Well, <MYNAME>, you're
all mine starting from today.

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
Oh, what's that? If we're going to be in
a relationship you want me to call you
by a different name?
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>Too much of a pain, sorry. <MYNAME> is
just fine. Don't complain too much or
I'll have to reconsider dating you.

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Yes, yes. It's fine how it is.
<PAGE>
More importantly, how that we're a
couple, you better be a willing subject
for all my experiments.

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
All that sound okay, <MYNAME>? You better
be good to me now. See you later.

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
...Oh, really? That's the response
you give me? Well, enough of you.

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
...I'm out of here. Goodbye.
